thinkpol.reader.reader_drivers package¶

Submodules¶

thinkpol.reader.reader_drivers.binary_driver module¶

class thinkpol.reader.reader_drivers.binary_driver.BinaryDriver(file_name)¶

Bases: object

Reads formatted binary data from a given file.

Parameters

  • file_name (str) – the name of the file

  • offset (int) – the amount of bytes already read from the file

field = 'binary'¶
get_snap_iterator()¶

Reads snapshots from the given file iteratively.

get_user_info()¶

Reads user info from the given file.

Returns

a 4-tuple - (user_id, user_name, birth_date, gender), containing user data.

Return type

tuple

thinkpol.reader.reader_drivers.protobuf_driver module¶

class thinkpol.reader.reader_drivers.protobuf_driver.ProtobufDriver(file_name)¶

Bases: object

Reads formatted gzipped protobuf data from a given file.

Parameters

  • file_name (str) – the name of the file

  • offset (int) – the amount of bytes already read from the file

field = 'protobuf'¶
get_snap_iterator()¶

Reads snapshots from the given file iteratively.

get_user_info()¶

Reads user info from the given file.

Returns

a 4-tuple - (user_id, user_name, birth_date, gender), containing user data.

Return type

tuple

Module contents¶

A framework that collects classes that end with ‘Driver’ and adds them to the drivers dict.

Thinkpol
